Description: Pottery ostracon, a thick wall sherd in red fabric with grey core. The surfaces are burnished and the interior is decorated with black painted decoration. Over this are two designs and eight lines of painted inscription.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395022) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395022)
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
